eng_before: and I will watch over you
and I will bring you back
but when I screamed for help,
and those on the other side

eng_after: they might provoke Me to anger
they might provoke Me to anger

eng_word: Can they restore [the wall] by themselves?

eng_before: But as soon as they had rest,

eng_after: Then I gathered the Levites and singers together
will feed on them in summer,

eng_before: Then you are to answer them:
Then you are to answer them:
when I will set them ablaze,”
